technology.title: Adopts
technology.description: Actively learns and adopts the technology and tools defined by the team

system_level.title: Enhances
system_level.description: Successfully pushes new features and bug fixes to improve and extend the system

people.title: Learns
people.description: Quickly learns from others and consistently steps up when it is required

soft_skill.title: Limited
soft_skill.description: Limited or no use of competency required for the job

english_level.title: Intermediate Low
english_level.description: Speaks more confidently and frequently corrects himself\herself when he\she understands his\her own mistakes

performance_level.title: Expected
performance_level.description: high speed and stability of task completeness, the minimal number of mistakes, all resources are used effectively

influence.title: Subsystem
influence.description: Makes an impact on one or more subsystems
